fullText: This musical adaptation of S.E. Hinton's beloved 1967 novel and Francis Ford Coppola's 1983 film is a triumph that captures the raw emotion and brotherhood of the original story.
dtliExcerpt: This musical adaptation of S.E. Hinton's beloved 1967 novel and Francis Ford Coppola's 1983 film is a triumph that captures the raw emotion and brotherhood of the original story.
